location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the last folio with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a telegram from the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to the Secretary of State for India, requesting the discontinuance of guidance telegrams. The telegram is accompanied by internal notes confirming that the request has been carried out.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
